title: The Lost Mage
description: When Darakin, an elemental mage of the Kwagl realm, is accidentally summoned to a strange world full of unknown technology, he finds himself overwhelmed and, worst of all; his elemental summoning magic won't work here. After reciting a translation spell, Darakin meets Mrowley, the cat. Armed only with Mrowley's company and limited knowledge of the human world, Darakin sets off to find work and to search for a way home.His strange accent lands him a job as a bouncer in a pub that employs illegal aliens. There he meets the beautiful Nora. As he falls in love with Nora, he learns that he wasn't the only creature summoned from his realm. Time is of the essence as he searches for a way to kill a dangerous, seemingly invincible demon without the use of his precious elemental magic.
author: Amy Difar
